entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
